title: Episode 335 w/ Shaquille O’Neal
itunes:title: Episode 335 w/ Shaquille O’Neal
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode we chop it up with the legend himself and Basketball Hall Of Fame Player, Shaquille O’Neal!

Champion season is here! The 4x NBA Champ and most dominant big man the sport has seen - sits down with the Drink Champs for an episode you don’t want to miss!

Shaq shares stories of Stevie Wonder, his NBA career, Kobe Bryant and much much more!

Lots of great stories that you don’t want to miss!!

Make some noise for Shaquille O’Neal!!! 💐💐💐🏆🏆🏆

Listen and subscribe at https://www.drinkchamps.com

 Follow Drink Champs:

https://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

https://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

https://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

https://www.youtube.com/drinkchamps

 DJ EFN

https://www.crazyhood.com

https://www.instagram.com/whoscrazy

https://www.twitter.com/djefn

https://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions

 N.O.R.E.

https://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga

https://www.twitter.com/noreaga

 

Check out our Culture Cards NFT project by joining The Culture Cards Discord:

Link below 👇

https://discord.gg/theculturecards

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
